mammoths.name: Classic Mammoth
mammoths.description: The Classic Mammoth is a loyal and sturdy companion, exuding strength and grace. This timeless marvel is perfect for diverse landscapes and adventures. From exploring vast terrains to creating cherished memories, the Classic Mammoth will be your trusted companion for a lifetime.

mammoths.name: Snow Mammoth
mammoths.description: The Snow Mammoth is specifically adapted for thrilling snowy escapades. With its thick, woolly coat and surefooted nature, it excels in conquering icy terrains. Experience the thrill of snowy expeditions like never before with the Snow Mammoth as your trusted guide.
